headline: July Dog Of The Dow's 'Safer' Buy: Verizon
summary: Verizon Communications Inc. stands out as the top Dow dividend pick with strong cash flow and value potential. Click for my analysis and why I like VZ.

headline: Jim Cramer Says “It’s the Time to Buy McDonald’s”
summary: McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) is one of the 21 stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar. During the lightning round, when a caller asked about the company, Cramer stated: “McDonald’s… you know, I’ve been saying that you must own McDonald’s here. You must. headline: 2 Reasons to Watch MCD and 1 to Stay Cautious
summary: McDonald's currently trades at $297.70 per share and has shown little upside over the past six months, posting a middling return of 1.8%.
